abstract: Wal-Mart and Costco reported April sales that rose more than analysts estimated as American consumers sought discounts on clothing and food.
snippet: Wal-Mart and Costco reported April sales that rose more than analysts estimated as American consumers sought discounts on clothing and food.
lead_paragraph: Wal-Mart and Costco reported April sales that rose more than analysts estimated as American consumers, contending with record gasoline prices, sought discounts on clothing and food.

headline.main: Retailers’ April Is Mixed, With Discounters Strong
headline.print_headline: Retailers’ April Is Mixed, With Discounters Strong
